channel.title: Help! error connecting to server? READD!
channel.description:
help please i can connect throught the main pc with the server on but when i try to connect on other compuuter i get [b]error connecting to server[/b] ----- [b]i am using port 49913[/b] please help and also i have tried 43594 port and still no luck.. i was wondering is ther e a specific way to enable the server? i run the server and stuff and says its online but i cant connect to it on my other pc help please! my ip is ..
ilovetopk.no-ip.org
[u][b][i]All help is 100% Apreciated![/i][/b][/u]

item.title: Help! error connecting to server? READD!
item.dc:creator: @Robert_Elsdon Robert Elsdon
item.source: Help! error connecting to server? READD!

item.title: Help! error connecting to server? READD!
item.dc:creator: @West7man West7man
item.description:
@West7man wrote:

I’ve got the same problem with udp ports… It lets connect only through 127.0.0.1 (localserver)
You can open them when you change your internet plan(talk with your internet provider).
It might be also a firewall problem. Check information about your internet pack… If the udp ports are open it must be a firewall problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! error connecting to server? READD!

item.title: Help! error connecting to server? READD!

@Robert_Elsdon wrote:

@West7man wrote:

Your UDP ports might be closed.
